Features and services

You may encounter some bugs when using the app but fell free to write to us the bug you have faced, because the app is still in development we have sofer implemented the following features and more that we have not listed here.


  • No monthly charges

    Simply download the app, and stream any movie of your choice without limitations.

  • Real time notification

    Get real time notifications about new uploaded movies by the time they are upload.

  • Faster download

    Download any movie with our sonic speed downloader and 100% free.

  • 12+ movie categories

    Stream all your favorite movies from 14+ movie translators (vjs) and 12+ movie categories.
